TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WhitespaceSignificantCollectionAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class WhitespaceSignificantCollectionAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class WhitespaceSignificantCollectionAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指示 XAML 处理器应以严格区分空格的方式处理某一集合类型。

span.span: Indicates that a collection type should be processed as being whitespace significant by a XAML processor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `xml:space` 是一个相关的概念，会影响 XAML 处理的空白区域，但与的用途是不相干的。`xml:space` is a related concept that influences XAML processing of white space but is orthogonal to the purpose of . 有关详细信息，请参阅[在 XAML 中的空白处理](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/whitespace-processing-in-xaml.md)。For more information, see [Whitespace Processing in XAML](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/whitespace-processing-in-xaml.md). 在以前版本的.NET Framework 中，此类特定于 WPF 程序集 WindowsBase 中存在。In previous versions of the .NET Framework, this class existed in the WPF-specific assembly WindowsBase. 在[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，位于 System.Xaml 程序集中。In [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], is in the System.Xaml assembly. 有关详细信息，请参阅[类型从 WPF 迁移到 System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md)。For more information, see [Types Migrated from WPF to System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md). ## WPF 用法说明WPF Usage Notes 是一个示例[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]类应用此特性的位置。 is an example [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] class where this attribute is applied.
